        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="17798" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="17798" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.89</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1776">1,776</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="116"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Inflorescence</b> by <b>Byredo</b> is a Floral fragrance for women. <b>Inflorescence</b> was launched in 2013. Top notes are Pink Freesia and Rose; middle notes are Lily-of-the-Valley and Magnolia; base note is Jasmine. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>In order to celebrate the awakening of nature and the beginning of Spring 2013, founder and creative director of the niche house of Byredo,Ben Gorham, will present the new fragrance named INFLORESCENCE. The focus of the new floral fragrance is on a wild garden transferring the strength and beauty of flowers and the perfect moment when they reach their dramatic peak of blooming.</p>

<p>
The new creation has resulted in combining carefully selected notes which are to offer and intertwine intoxicating, honey and fresh floral aromas, without deserting the Spring theme in any moment. The composition opens with rich and intoxicating rose petals scent combined with honey pink freesia. The heart adds a cool spring wave of citrusy-green lily of the valley and creamy magnolia, intertwining their scents to the very base dominated by luxurious jasmine with its sweet freshness. 
The fragrance Inflorescence is available in the characteristic flacon as 100 ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4" v-pre>
</div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><gender-widget :perfume_id="17798"></gender-widget></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><price-value-widget :perfume_id="17798"></price-value-widget></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><similar-perfumes :perfume_id="17798" title="This perfume reminds me of"><div class="strike-title">
  <span>
    This perfume reminds me of
  </span>
</div>
<div class="carousel">
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.346.jpg" alt="Chlo Innocence Chlo">
                <span class="brand">Chlo</span>
                <br>Chlo Innocence
            </a>
        </div>
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.42238.jpg" alt="Totally White 126 Parle Moi de Parfum">
                <span class="brand">Parle Moi de Parfum</span>
                <br>Totally White 126
            </a>

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371838" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079916">Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733421715" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh green floral scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2371838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2371838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371588" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="black_orchid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/81370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.81370.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="black_orchid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Une-Fleur-de-Cassie-4773.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4773.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Une Fleur de Cassie"title="Une Fleur de Cassie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371588ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371588" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/81370">black_orchid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733405768" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells more white fressia bouquet than lily of the valley for me. I love it because it smells like sunny spring mornings after night rain. Fresh, green and uplifting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2371588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2371588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355546" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="archerries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2057645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="archerries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645">archerries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's giving hand sanitiser at first I fear. Then onto fresh, green white florals. Boring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2355546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2355546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317630" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ferra_Verto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ferra_Verto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-Taylor/Diamonds-and-Rubies-1705.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1705.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Diamonds and Rubies"title="Diamonds and Rubies"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160884">Ferra_Verto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 09:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Testing my sample; this is fully bloomed, photorealistic lily-of-the-valley and freesia in a sunlit greenhouse. There's a hint of spice but overall it's fresh and soapy.<br />
Warm &amp; hot weather only, no other feasible temps to wear this.<br />
I'd definitely get a full bottle of this for summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2317630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2317630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314727" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314727" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="byrehoe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1577248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="byrehoe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jouissance/En-Plein-Air-98080.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.98080.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="En Plein Air"title="En Plein Air"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314727ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314727" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577248">byrehoe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 14:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like huffing hundreds of tiny white blooms, while staring directly into the sun. Muguet takes the centre stage here, with jasmine close behind. This fragrance is airy, ozonic. Theres a slight greenness that grounds it, like the chlorophyll-infused water in the bottom of a vase. Its bright and ethereal, but I usually prefer my white florals with a side of citrus.  Longevity is solid (~6 hours) for a clean, cloudless-sky scent. <br />
<br />
Mental Snapshot: Lay in the middle of the park. Gaze into the summer sky until your retinas bleach white. Ditzels of hot, vivid light dance behind your eyelids, forming a pixelated bouquet.<br />
<br />
tl;dr: sun-bleached blossoms </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2314727"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2314727#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

It captures Lilly of the valley in its initial fresh bloom. Very bright and green and unripe</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2305047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2305047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271590" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katherina.1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1671948"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1671948.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="katherina.1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1671948">katherina.1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 13:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Byredo and have almost all of their offerings. This one surprised me a lot because based on the reviews, I was afraid it would be too green for my liking. Most definitely not. I actually love this! <br />
<br />
Yes its fresh and its like smelling a fresh cut bouquet, so in that sense, its green.. but its sweet and almost creamy in a way I cant describe. Maybe its the mix of my lotion that does this, but its definitely creamy and heavenly. <br />
<br />
Its a perfect spring/summer scent except for those very hot humid days, because like someone else has mentioned, it might be too sweet and cloying for that. I can also see myself wearing this in the winter when I need a little pick me up boost.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2271590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2271590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2253544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2253544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248473" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248473" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gpaisley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1181355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gpaisley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248473ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248473" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181355">gpaisley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 21:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just a little review to share that INFLUORESCENCE is a very sheer, pretty, feminine floral with an ethereal airy ozonic quality to it. Lovely, spring, freshly-cut long green stems of white flowers in a vase filled with cool water. Light dainty wafts of lily of the valley and freesia dance on a translucent, opalescent background. If INFLUORESCENCE perfume was a color, in my mind, it would be the color of the clear, iridescent, opalescent cellophane gift wrapping.   <br />
<br />
INFLUORESCENCE actually reminds me very much of the following 3 scents: <br />
- HELLO BEAUTIFUL by Bath and Body Works <br />
- BEAUTIFUL BLOSSOMS by Bodycology <br />
- LILY of the VALLEY by Yardley</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2248473"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2248473#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229308" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ech0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1727282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ech0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229308ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229308" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727282">ech0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 14:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to say I expected more regarding lily of the valley from this based on the reviews because I bought it without testing first. Lotv here is more like the one in Penhaligon's -- green and not that natural (although green is good). So for me, it just does not beat the Yves Rocher Muguet En Fleurs by the lotv smell -- once again, so after having tested many lotv scents (Amouage Ciel is waiting for a retest) the YR seems to be above everything else, on another level so to say, if only it would last longer too. Lotv in Inflorescence actually lasts longer and is quite good on my shirt while on skin it is more like the Penhaligon's version. Based on this I think this is overpriced but I got it cheaper anyway so nothing too much to complain.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2229308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2229308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224623" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sleepiestgirlinthevalley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2076924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sleepiestgirlinthevalley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224623ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224623" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076924">sleepiestgirlinthevalley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 15:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i get makeup/baby wipes but i think im into it?<br />
<br />
edit. not into it (for myself)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2224623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2224623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221509" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221509" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LadyIva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1013003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LadyIva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Portrayal-Woman-54459.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54459.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrayal Woman"title="Portrayal Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221509ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221509" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013003">LadyIva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 13:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is mainly a jasmine fragrance. Yes, there are some other flowers in this bouquet, but jasmine quickly overpowers them all and remains the dominant note throughout the scents duration. Speaking of which, Inflorescence is one of the strongest and most durable Byredo fragrances; considering how fleeting most of their products are, this is a pleasant surprise. Still not worth the money imho, but at least decent enough. All in all, this is strictly for the jasmine lovers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2221509"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2221509#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006908" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dina France"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1549379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dina France" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valmont/Blu-Cobalto-I-49424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blu Cobalto I"title="Blu Cobalto I"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549379">Dina France</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-21">12/21/23 05:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lilly of the Valley is one of my favorite flowers in the world. But I have always hated it as a note in perfumes because this note is far from the actual flowers and can be very annoying, synthetic or old lady like. This perfume is the best imitation of the real flowers and this is the only note I hear from A to Z. Big love!<br />
<br />
Dina_France (YouTube perfume reviews)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="2006908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=2006908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1937480" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1937480" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="auror"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/164080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.164080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="auror" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1937480ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1937480" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/164080">auror</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-26">09/26/23 00:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spring breeze in a bottle! I fell in love with it  It is such a fresh and energetic floral scent. I especially like its drydown since the bubble-gummy jasmine became noticeable to my nose then. Actually, I didn't expect it to like this much it but now it is on my to buy list  I highly recommended if you like fresh floral scents. It has a good sillage and longevity, too!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1937480"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1937480#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1935977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1935977" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BetterDays2024"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BetterDays2024" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Meliora-18750.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18750.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Meliora"title="Meliora"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1935977ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1935977" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833536">BetterDays2024</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-24">09/24/23 03:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a realistic, clean floral in its purest form for those of us who love the intoxicating aroma of flowers in bloom that literally stops you in your tracks in springtime to hunt down the source of the heavenly aroma. It is not juvenile nor granny, it is for any woman that genuinely loves flowers. It is not one of those floral perfumes that just smells like vaguely floral perfumey chemicals. Theres no obnoxious patchouli or vanilla base to dominate the flowers. Inflorescence just lets them be the star of the show. The most prevalent one I detect is Lily of the Valley. If you loved Guerlain Muguet but didnt love the price, give Inflorescence a try. It doesnt have the best longevity so you will need to respray but its worth it. Im glad they didnt add any heavy base notes to increase the longevity, that would have ruined the magic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1935977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1935977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912940" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912940" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gpaisley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1181355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gpaisley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912940ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912940" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181355">gpaisley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-27">08/27/23 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very pretty fresh, airy, light, green, white floral fragrance. As one reviewer wrote below, it really does smell like when you put your nose into a bouquet of fresh cut white florals and inhale while the flowers are still firm and green and closed and haven't bloomed yet. It reminds me a little of the Bath and Body Works "Hello Beautiful" body mist. Hello Beautiful however is more sharp, chemical, and green, whereas Inflorescence has no sharp corners, it's just an airy fresh white and blush pink floral with a faint hint of green that makes the fragrance really capture the natural essence of real fresh budding florals. Regarding potency, Inflorescence is more of a skin scent - it is quite light and doesn't project much and lasting power is about 1 hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1912940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1912940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910286" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tembacat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814578"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814578.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tembacat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Chipmunk-67998.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67998.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chipmunk"title="Chipmunk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910286ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910286" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814578">Tembacat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-24">08/24/23 07:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Airy, pretty, fragrant flowers. Not my usual style but it is very compelling. I would happily wear this on a bright spring or summer day, but not when it is too warm or it could easily become sticky and cloying. I love each of the floral notes listed, and don't find that any overpower the others. This is one I would perhaps spray in my hair or on a light spring  jacket to get a lovely flower trail around me. Very nice, but definitely situational.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1910286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1910286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908744" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Babey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1771034.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Babey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goutal/Eau-De-Charlotte-1189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau De Charlotte"title="Eau De Charlotte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771034">Babey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 12:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love at first sniff ! Smells exactly like when your lover lays a bouquet on the table, in the morning, and u bend to smell them freshly cut, wet and not completely bloomed flowers. It may seem linear at first but after some wears you discern the soft sweet young roses at first then the jasmine and lilies of the valley coming through later pumped up by the magnolia citrussy scent. A truly unisex scent when u acknowledge the fact that flowers are genderless despite the whole marketing idiology.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1908744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1908744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very linear as well. Sillage and projection is nonexistent. So far Bal D'Afrique is the only Byredo worthy of full bottle to me. Sundazed is nice as well. This? No. I'll rather just wear MFK's 724 for fresh and clean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1858054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1858054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1852584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852584" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="linteresa35"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1575983"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="linteresa35" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Lazy-Sunday-Morning-20542.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20542.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lazy Sunday Morning"title="Lazy Sunday Morning"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1575983">linteresa35</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-09">06/09/23 07:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All the other Byredo perfumes I've tried have had the worst staying power so once I got a sample on this one I sprayed myself pretty liberally and it's great that this perfume lasts really long and it's actually too strong. The smell is really great and definitely a love at first sniff kind of scent that won't offend anyone but it's literally so strong that it makes me nauseous. I sprayed about 4-5 times and I felt like I was going to throw up every time I inhaled. I will try spraying just once or twice next time but even still I think there is just something in this scent that is too overwhelming. With my other perfumes, even if I overspray and constantly smell it I don't feel nauseous... I think there is something in this fragrance that is too overpowering and overdone. This is a scent that's nice to catch a whiff of but not to constantly smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1852584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1852584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824732" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AkaNeri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524122"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1524122.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AkaNeri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824732ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824732" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524122">AkaNeri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-04">05/04/23 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's pretty fresh floral, but if you're not the fan of florals - well, it's not for you for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1824732"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1824732#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1817415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1817415" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tovah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3399"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.3399.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tovah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17798.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Inflorescence"title="Inflorescence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1817415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1817415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3399">Tovah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-25">04/25/23 13:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Since I usually can't stand lily of the valley or freesia, it's bizarre that I love this fragrance.  I guess the combination of those two scents together erases their individual unpleasantness to my nose. I think this is beautiful!  It's uplifting, easy to wear, crowd-pleasing, me-pleasing, unique, and feminine.  It costs more than I would like to pay, but doesn't everything?<br />
<br />
Whenever my husband like any fragrance of mine, at all, he claims, "Oooo - smells like orange blossom." (It doesn't matter if it smells like road tar, if he likes it, it's "orange blossom".)  When he smelled Inflorescence, he said, "Mmmm - I LOVE it when you wear orange blossom!"  In this case, I get what he means.  The orange blossom we're used to in California (as well as the jasmine) has a airy, sweet quality that is prevalent in this perfume.  As I said before, I don't get freesia or lily of the valley...so I'm happy to call it orange blossom if that's what suits it.  I read a review below that compares this to Jo Malone Orange Blossom, and I absolutely agree!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1817415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1817415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1810764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells a bit like Kai or Beach Walk to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1810764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1810764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1759175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not too cold, but opens as straight up alcohol and the scent is so light its as if its not a scent at all. La Tulipe is similar but more like a baby powder, it at least projects unlike this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1759175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1759175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1738011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722612" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jasmine92"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1605404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jasmine92" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chloe/Chene-89914.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89914.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chne"title="Chne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1605404">Jasmine92</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-01">01/01/23 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon the opening, it smells of fresh cut lilies and the green notes really pop. It dries down to reveal the delicate sweetness of the other white florals. This encapsulates the essence of a fragrant white floral bouquet in a bottle that is light and airy, and smells so real and natural. Just gorgeous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1722612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1722612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1717602" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marianj234"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1431079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marianj234" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1717602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1717602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1431079">Marianj234</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-26">12/26/22 07:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This opens very green and fresh like cut flowers. It feels cold and dewy, probably from the aldehydes. Its just a little bit spicy too. The freshness of the opening is fleeting but like another reviewer said, this performs well in that it maintains its delicacy throughout wear. Its soapy but it doesnt go stale on skin. Its a classic white floral, made modern with greenness and transparency. The longevity is poor and the sillage is almost undetectable after an hour. It quickly fades, leaving just a faint sensation of having slightly soapy, freshly washed skin. Its nice as a hygiene product to apply after a shower.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1717602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1717602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1709723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very weak though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1696981"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1696981#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1687081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I have actually created my own fragrance and this is very reminiscent...so ya! it's a total LOVE &lt;3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1687081"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1687081#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1683013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1683013" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alchemist1976stephanie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/95986"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.95986.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alchemist1976stephanie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tokyo-Milk-Parfumerie-Curiosite/Tainted-Love-13161.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13161.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tainted Love"title="Tainted Love"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1683013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1683013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/95986">alchemist1976stephanie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-07">11/07/22 10:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nostalgia in a bottle for me! It reminds me of the little lily of the valley bath cubes I used to get for Christmas in my stocking from Crabtree and Evelyn. I dont know that Id want to wear it as a perfume but Id definitely use it as a bath scent!! That would be one expensive bath though so I might just stick with the body wash.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1683013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1683013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1672835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1469399">koldlady</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-24">10/24/22 00:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love at the first sniff. When I first smell it, I can smell frangipani, straight up frangipani even when theres no frangipani note in here. Frangipani and Magnolia but in a sensual way, really mature, elegant and sophisticated. This is the smell of feminine to me, I can imagine myself wearing a white dress dancing under the Magnolia tree on a spring day. Absolutely gorgeous scent, definitely my all time favorite white floral scent. Only problem was the price, I still couldnt buy the full-size bottle yet but definitely need it asap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1672835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1672835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1624736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="raidiological"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1242256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="raidiological" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1624736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1624736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); Opens up with big blast of freesia and jasmine with a slight green accord. Quite linear if i remember correctly, but I really adore how crisp and fresh the flowers are in this perfume. <br />
<br />
Only lasts less than 2 hours on my skin, I assume this has the same longevity as Mojave Ghost since that one also doesnt last on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17798"comment_id="1624736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Inflorescence-17798.html?ccid=1624736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1624011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
